---
title: AP-LS Newsletter Archives
title-block-banner: "../../images/default-banner.svg"
page-layout: full
listing:
  - id: twenty-two
    contents:
    - "2022/**/*.qmd"
    type: grid
    sort: "date desc"
    sort-ui: false
  - id: twenty-one
    contents:
    - "2021/**/*.qmd"
    type: grid
    sort: "date desc"
    sort-ui: false
  - id: news
    contents: 
      - "apls-news/*.qmd"
      - "news-archive.yml"
    type: grid
    fields: [date, title, image, categories]
    sort: "date desc"
    image-height: 100%
    image-placeholder: logo.png
    template: news-listing.ejs
---
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
source("../../assets/apls_functions.R")
```
